column4: We make ADR (Architectural Decision Records) where we document: big picture, why, list the options, then mark who participated in meetings about, ask anyone who's interested to leave comments, and then we document what we decided and why. That becomes company's knowledge base. So even if it turns out to have been a bad decision, you can come back to it and learn from it.
